TextView.android:text: B(ii). Percent of total food consumption from each source
Other Pulses, seeds and nuts (green grams, dried peas, cowpeas etc)
White Roots, and Tubers and Plantain (including wild) (irish and sweet potatoes, cassava, turnip, arrow root, cooked or roasted bananas etc)
Spices, condiments and beverages (chili, hot sauce, coffee, tea etc)
